mapper.sql: id, name, author, introduction, commit_date, commit_user
mapper.insert:
insert into book
id,
name,
author,
introduction,
commit_date,
commit_user,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update book
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commit_date = #{commitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
commit_user = #{commitUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update book set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commit_date = #{commitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, commit_user = #{commitUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
